title: "Hollis Kennels" hand written font
content: As far as I can tell it's not one of the almost 2,600 script/handwritten fonts I have collected in the Script Font ID Guide, and if you DO find out what it is, I would be interested to add it to the Guide. It's a rather oddly done script, that takes an unusual approach to allow connecting letters with steeply slanting terminal strokes, but it gives the words a kind of style, in a homely sort of way.
author: bowfinpw
